section.title: Description
section.para: When standard skinning classes or background images are inaccessible "Resource not registered : org.richfaces.renderkit.html.images.InputBackgroundImage" (another name is possible) exception appears in server log.

section.title: How to reproduce
section.para: The described above problem usually occurs after server restart when user refreshes the page

section.title: Causes
section.para: The problem is caused when resources for standard skinning classes are not available to be registered during RichFaces library build

section.title: Workarounds
section.para: Switch off standard skinning classes by setting initial parameter in web.xml:
Add META-INF/resources-config.xml to the application classpath.
